Controller - Class in <Unnamed>
The hardware controller for driving data path.
Controller(CPU) - Constructor for class Controller
Create a controller
Controller.ADD_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
ADD_LHS_B Add together left hand register value and B into C
Controller.ADDS_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
ADDS_LHS_B Add together left hand register value and B into C (setting flags)
Controller.AND_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
AND_LHS_B Logical AND together left hand register value and B into C
Controller.EOR_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
EOR_LHS_B Logical OR together left hand register value and B into C
Controller.Fetch0 - Class in <Unnamed>
Fetch0 Store the program counter in the memory address register
Controller.Fetch1 - Class in <Unnamed>
FETCH1 Increments the program counter and loads (previous pc) to memory data register
Controller.Fetch2 - Class in <Unnamed>
FETCH2 Moves the data from the memory data register to the instruction register
Controller.LDUR2 - Class in <Unnamed>
LDUR2 Load C into MA
Controller.LDUR3 - Class in <Unnamed>
LDUR3 Load main memory
Controller.LDUR4 - Class in <Unnamed>
LDUR4 Store MD in destination register
Controller.LOAD_B_IMM - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_B_IMM Move the right hand value into B
Controller.LOAD_B_RHS - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_B_RHS Move the right hand register value into B
Controller.LOAD_DEST_C - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_DEST_C Move C into destination register
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR Move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_EQ - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_EQ If Z == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_GE - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_GE If N == V, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_GT - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_GT If Z == 0 AND N == V, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_LE - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_LE If !(Z == 0 AND N == V), then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_LT - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_LT If N != V, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_MI - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_MI If N == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_NE - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_NE If Z == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_PL - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_PL If N == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_VC - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_VC If V == 0, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_PTR_VS - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_PTR_VS If V == 1, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_REG - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_REG Move the register value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_REG_NZ - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_REG_NZ If the register isn't zero, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_PC_REG_Z - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_PC_REG_Z If the register is zero, then move the pointer value into PC
Controller.LOAD_REG_PTR - Class in <Unnamed>
LOAD_REG_PTR Move the value of the pointer immediate into the register
Controller.NOP - Class in <Unnamed>
NOP The RTN for doing nothing with the processor.
Controller.ORR_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
ORR_LHS_B Logical OR together left hand register value and B into C
Controller.RTN - Interface in <Unnamed>
 
Controller.STUR2 - Class in <Unnamed>
STUR2 Load C into MA Load source register into MD
Controller.STUR3 - Class in <Unnamed>
STUR3 Store main memory
Controller.SUB_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
SUB_LHS_B Add together left hand register value and B into C
Controller.SUBS_LHS_B - Class in <Unnamed>
SUBS_LHS_B Add together left hand register value and B into C (setting flags)
